At the initial position, you are asked to follow a series of movement instructions. In terms of next steps, what is the best next step for you?  
choose:  
A. I go up and turn left.  
B. I descend and fly forward.  
C. I fly forward while rotating the camera upward.  
D. I turn left and go up.  
E. I rotate the camera downward and fly forward.
